objective: Read the steps of a certain procedure from procedure name

voice_response.template: Okay. I will read each step of the procedure ${procedure} one at a time. You can say NEXT or PREVIOUS to go to the next or previous step of the procedure. You can also say REPEAT if you want me to repeat a step again. The steps of this procedure are. ${procedure_step_number}. ${procedure_step_action}

visual_response.template:
Okay. I will read each step of the procedure ${procedure} one at a time. You can say NEXT or PREVIOUS to go to the next or previous step of the procedure. You can also say REPEAT if you want me to repeat a step again. The steps of this procedure are:

${procedure_step_number}: ${procedure_step_action}
